mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Sharp, William J.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: St. Claire Tpt. West Moreland Co., PA [St. Claire Tpt. Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Sharp, William J. Patient Age: 41. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Contusion of the breast left side at the cartilage [illegible] extremities of the fifth sixth and seventh ribs, and gunshot flesh wound of back. ball entered over sphenoid process of eleventh vertebrae bullet lodged extracted on the field by Dr. Hall? Slight.. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/15. Nature of Wound: Revolver bullet. Treatment: Contusion of the breast left side at the cartilaginous extremities of the fifth, sixth and seventh ribs and gun shot flesh wound of back. Ball entered over spinous process of eleventh vertebra. Bullet lodged. Extracted on the field by Dr. Hall. . Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
